newsitem.title: USA: CANTV stake held by GTE Corp.
newsitem.headline: CANTV stake held by GTE Corp.

text.p: A group led by GTE Corp said Monday it holds a 15.6 percent stake in Compania Anonima Nacional Telefonos De Venezuela CANTV (National Telephone Co of Venezuela) equal to 48,965,000 Class D common or 6,995,000 American Depositary Shares.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said it bought the ADSs between Nov 27 and Dec 6 at prices ranging from $23 to $27 per share. Of the total stake, 4,350,000 ADSs were bought on Nov 27 in the initial public offering.

GTE Corp, of Stamford, Conn., is the largest U.S.-based local telephone company and a cellular-service provider, with wireline and wireless operations that form a market area covering about one-third of the country's population.
